entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 9:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
